PlanetCoasterXML

Class Window.XMLFilePath

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlanetCoasterXML.Window.XMLFilePath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    Window

    private class Window.XMLFilePath
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Listener for choose the XML file
    This class ask the user to chose a file, then load the file and check for duplicates

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean isFirstFile 
      (package private) Window window_reference 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLFilePath(boolean isFirst, Window win_ref) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      This listener open the file-chooser window to choose the file to analyze
      private void manage_exception()
      This method manage the exceptions that may occur in the thread
      Basically it display an error message that say why the file has not loaded
      void run()
      Thread execution for loading the files
      Loading the first file: If duplicate keys are found, a warning message is sent
      Loading the second file: If duplicate keys are found, the program ask the user if he want to remove the duplicates; In that case, it overwrite the file loaded map; Otherwise, a warning message is sent

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        This listener open the file-chooser window to choose the file to analyze
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - the button that called the action

      • manage_exception

        private void manage_exception()
        This method manage the exceptions that may occur in the thread
        Basically it display an error message that say why the file has not loaded

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread execution for loading the files
        Loading the first file: If duplicate keys are found, a warning message is sent
        Loading the second file: If duplicate keys are found, the program ask the user if he want to remove the duplicates; In that case, it overwrite the file loaded map; Otherwise, a warning message is sent
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
